text: Open range, in Western United States, is the publicly accessible grazeland. Open range may also refer to: *Rangeland, vast natural landscapes * Publicly owned rangeland, in the United States *Open Range Communications, a Colorado- based (now bankrupt) telecommunications business *Open-range zoo *Open Range (1927 film), a lost silent film from Paramount Pictures. *Open Range (2003 film), a Western film co-starring, co-produced, and directed by Kevin Costner ==See also== *Free range (disambiguation)
title: Open range (disambiguation)
